actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees group life insurance.

summary.text: Increases the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees' group life insurance and provides a corresponding decrease in the employee contribution. (Amends 5 U.S.C. 8707, 8708)

titles.title: A bill to increase the contribution by the Federal Government to the costs of employees group life insurance.
